title: How to use Netflix on my Fire Stick for free - Quora

response.answer_text: You can’t you can only get a free trial Netflix is not a free service no matter what platform you use. You could use a shared account and find someone you know who has a Netflix account to give you their Netflix account to use on your fire stick otherwise just pay for Netflix

You can’t crack the service in order to watch it for free, you need an (someone’s?) account in order to watch it. If you want to watch it for free you should find someone who would be willing to share their account credentials with you.
